#include <cstdio>
#include <bitset>

using namespace std;
const int MAXN = 10010;
const int MAXP = 2000;
bitset<MAXN> b;
int pr[MAXP];
int k;

void sieve() {
    for (int i = 2; i < MAXN; i++) {
        if (b[i] == 0) {
            pr[k++] = i;
            for (int j = 2 * i; j < MAXN; j += i)
                b[j] = 1;
        }
    }
}

int solve(int n) {
    if (b[n] == 0) return n - 1;
    for (int i = 0; i < k && pr[i] <= n; i++) {
        if (n % pr[i] == 0) {
            n /= pr[i];
            n *= (pr[i] - 1);
        }
    }
    return n;
}

int main() {
    int t, n;
    sieve();
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while(t--) {
        scanf("%d", &n);
        printf("%d\n", solve(n));
    }
    return 0;
}
